Hi guys, this is my new game. It is a mystery story about a man investigating strange happenings near his house, and has a twist ending.
Here is the link: [url:8d4mtrcd]http://play.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=a5jvfrxwa0ahvvhizk-ziw[/url:8d4mtrcd]
Posts.HTML:
Hi guys, this is my new game. It is a mystery story about a man investigating strange happenings near his house, and has a twist ending.
Here is the link: http://play.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=a5jvfrxwa0ahvvhizk-ziw

Posts.EditableText: It's very short and you die easily. You've shown that you know how to create these games so you need to apply those skills to a greater project, in my opinion. Remember: what may be many hours of work for you can often translate to seconds of game play to your audience.
